Package gui.view

Class HelpScene

java.lang.Object
gui.view.HelpScene
public class HelpScene
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the helpScene which shows an image with text on it to help the player understand the game.
Author:
Judith

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.layout.Pane helpPane
    new pane that holds all the nodes of the helpScene
    private javafx.scene.Scene helpScene
    new scene that show the helpPane
    private static java.lang.String PATH_TO_BACKGROUND_IMAGE
    String with the path to the background image

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HelpScene()
    Constructs an object of this class an initializes the helpPane with the method initializeHelpPane().

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    javafx.scene.Scene getHelpScene()
    Getter for the helpScene.
    private void initializeButton()
    This method implements the button that makes it possible to go back to the menuScene.
    private void initializeHelpPane()
    This method initializes the helpPane.
    private void initializeText()
    This method implements the help text.

    • helpPane

      new pane that holds all the nodes of the helpScene

      new scene that show the helpPane

      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • HelpScene

      public HelpScene()
      Constructs an object of this class an initializes the helpPane with the method initializeHelpPane().

  • Method Details

    • initializeHelpPane

      private void initializeHelpPane()
      This method initializes the helpPane. It sets the background image and the size and implements the help text and the button to get back to the menuScene with the help of the method initializeText() and initializeButton().

    • initializeText

      private void initializeText()
      This method implements the help text. The background image of the empty text field is set to the helpText image.

    • initializeButton

      private void initializeButton()
      This method implements the button that makes it possible to go back to the menuScene.

    • getHelpScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getHelpScene()
      Getter for the helpScene.
      Returns:
      the requested helpScene
